long_description: With a 300-lumen beam to light the way, a 3 hr. runtime to outlast commutes and a USB cable to charge it at the home or office, the CatEye Volt 300 front bike light fits nicely into everyday routines. Five different lighting modes (high, normal, low, hyper constant, flashing) let you adjust your lighting needs on the go. Runs up to 3 hrs. (high); 8 hrs. (normal); 18 hrs. (low); 11 hrs. (Hyper Constant) and 60 hrs. (flashing). Beam is optimized for straight-ahead visibility, but lens also emits light sideways to enhance safety. Low battery indicator on the CatEye Volt 300 front bike light lets you know when it's time to charge up the battery with the included micro USB cable; charge time is 8 hrs. Includes handlebar mount, helmet mount and charging cable.
short_description: With a 300-lumen beam to light the way, a 3 hr. runtime to outlast commutes and a USB cable to charge it at the home or office, the CatEye Volt 300 front bike light fits nicely into everyday routines.
